amendment.description: Amendment authorizes the President to remove all Brigade Combat Teams that are permanently stationed in Europe and replace them with a rotational force.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 48 printed in House Report 112-485 to authorize the President to remove all Brigade Combat Teams that are permanently stationed in Europe and replace them with a rotational force.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Coffman (CO) amendment (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 196 (Roll no. 284).
